content.label: Display Style / 屏幕显示样式
Clear Settings / 删除键盘所有配置（使用后需要重启键盘）
Reboot Keyboard / 重启键盘（VIA会退出）
Keyboard DFU / 进入键盘刷机模式（VIA会退出）

customKeycodes.name: Light mode
customKeycodes.title: [LNT_MOD] Toggle RGB Matrix or Light mode control / 切换轴灯与氛围灯配置模式

customKeycodes.name: Light Power
customKeycodes.title: [LNT_TOG] Toggle all LED power / 物理开关灯供电

customKeycodes.name: Device shutdown
customKeycodes.title: [LNT_OFF] The device enters shutdown mode / 设备进入关机

customKeycodes.name: USB Mode
customKeycodes.title: [CNT_USB] Enter USB mode / 切换到USB模式

customKeycodes.name: Clear bound
customKeycodes.title: [BLE_CLC] Clear the current BLE bound / 清除当前蓝牙分组配对

customKeycodes.name: Clear all bounds
customKeycodes.title: [BLE_CLA] Clear all BLE bounds / 清除所有蓝牙分组配对

customKeycodes.name: BLE G1
customKeycodes.title: [BLE_GP1] Enter Bluetooth group 1 / 切换蓝牙分组 1

customKeycodes.name: BLE G2
customKeycodes.title: [BLE_GP2] Enter Bluetooth group 2 / 切换蓝牙分组 2

customKeycodes.name: BLE G3
customKeycodes.title: [BLE_GP3] Enter Bluetooth group 3 / 切换蓝牙分组 3

customKeycodes.name: Radio 2.4G
customKeycodes.title: [WIR_G24] Enter radio 2.4G mode / 切换 2.4G 模式

customKeycodes.name: 2.4G receiver DFU
customKeycodes.title: [WIR_BOT] Enter the 2.4G recevier dfu mode / 进入 2.4G 刷机模式

customKeycodes.name: Sleep mode
customKeycodes.title: [SLP_MOD] Sleep interval selection / 切换休眠时长

customKeycodes.name: Info leds
customKeycodes.title: [INF_LED] Toggle display current KBD to Led / 切换键盘状态指示灯模式

customKeycodes.name: Info
customKeycodes.title: [INF_OUT] Print the current KBD information / 输出当前键盘信息

customKeycodes.name: Screen style
customKeycodes.title: [LCD_STY] Screen style color setting / 屏幕颜色样式设置
